data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,035 believers in Saint Peter Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Peter Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Saint Peter Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Saint Peter Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Saint Peter Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,035 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, cause the 1,035 believers in Saint Peter Basseterre to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Saint Peter Basseterre.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.focus_label: Saint Peter Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis
